# Bay Area Dog

> The ultimate guide for dog owners in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Bay Area Dog helps dog owners find the best trails, restaurants, parks, shops, and resources across the San Francisco Bay Area. The site covers 23+ dog-friendly hiking trails with detailed descriptions, difficulty ratings, and GPS coordinates, plus curated guides for dining, playing, and shopping with your dog.

## Main Sections

- [Home](https://www.bayarea.dog/en)
- [Trails](https://www.bayarea.dog/en/trails) — 23+ dog-friendly hiking trails with ratings, distances, and descriptions
- [Eat](https://www.bayarea.dog/en/eat) — Dog-friendly restaurants and cafes
- [Play](https://www.bayarea.dog/en/play) — Dog parks, beaches, and play areas
- [Shop](https://www.bayarea.dog/en/shop) — Pet stores and dog supplies
- [Learn](https://www.bayarea.dog/en/learn) — Guides and resources for dog owners
